text: Rajesh Khanna (29 December 1942 18 July 2012) was an Indian actor in movies. He became very famous in Bollywood after Shakti Samantha's movie Aradhana. Rajesh played both the father and son in that movie. Some of his well-known movies are Anand, Kati Patang, Safar, Sacha Jhuta, Raja Rani, Bawarchi and Amar Prem. == Other websites == * Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian movie producers Category:1942 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Punjabi people Category:Bollywood playback singers
title: Rajesh Khanna
